DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Log List
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Integration errors by Integrator","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":0,"WidgetYPosition":3,"WidgetRows":26,"WidgetColumns":48,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[{"visible":true,"metricName":"? Integration Errors","metricFieldValue":"Integration Errors"}]},"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select top 500
	LoggedOn,
	DocumentType, 
	OperationId, 
	DocumentName, 
	ErrorMessage, 
	ProgressMessage, 
	Content,
	(	select 
			max(LoggedOn) 
		from 
			CompanyIntegrationLog 
		where 
			OperationId = z.OperationId 
	) as MaxLoggedOn
from 
	CompanyIntegrationLog z
where 
	OperationId is not null and
    DocumentType = 'IntegrationWorkflow' AND
     DocumentName in( convert(nvarchar(50), @AWId), @AWName)

    /*[DateFilter]*/ and cast(LoggedOn as Date) between @FromDate AND @ToDate /*[/DateFilter]*/
order by 
	LoggedOn desc","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"RequiredFilters":["startDate","endDate","AWName","AWId"]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Log Range
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"LogRange","WidgetType":"rangeselector","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"#e0e0e0","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":0,"WidgetYPosition":0,"WidgetRows":3,"WidgetColumns":48,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"startDate":"2019/06/01","endDate":"2019/08/30","type":"year","visible":false},"showSubTitle":false,"showTitle":false},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select 
	count(distinct OperationId) as OperationIdTotal, 
	cast(LoggedOn as Date) as [Day] 
from 
	CompanyIntegrationLog
where 
	OperationId is not null
group by 
	cast(LoggedOn as Date)
order by 
	[Day] desc","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":null}]
